pageContext.title: Collaborative Ajax-Based Modeling Platform
pageContext.description_excerpt: CAMP stands for 'Collaborative, Ajax-Based, Modeling Platform.' As the name suggests, this tool is an open source, collaborative, 3-dimensional modeler that allows users with very little experience to generate a 3-dimensional model in their web browser which they can then allow other users to both view and edit. The tool was initially used to construct an international database of pre-nineteenth century theater buildings, but was designed to be intentionally generic so that scholars interested in structures of any sort could easily port it into their own projects.
pageContext.participants: Doug Reside, Elisabeth Kvernen, Frank Hildy, Gregory Lord, Kirsten Keister, Travis Brown
